New Records: Jayson Tatum scored 29 points and 7 rebounds, and Payton Pritchard added 22 points off the bench
Key Match Events: The Celtics regained control down the stretch after the Hornets trimmed the Boston lead to three points with an 18-3 run to start the second half
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum declined to greet Grant Williams after the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luke Kornet posted a perfect shooting line in spot start with 19 points on 6-of-6 shooting from the field
Others: The Celtics improved to 6-1 with the victory, and are now 2-1 on their four-game road trip
